--Copiar a Dedicated SQL Pool con Polybase

CREATE SCHEMA staging
GO

--Crea una tabla externa en SQL Dedicated Pool a partir de datos particionados por fecha en el Datalake
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'parquet_file_format') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'electric_vehicle_data_src') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE electric_vehicle_data_src 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://electric-vehicle-data@entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.ext_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type (
	[year] smallint,
	[month] tinyint,
	[make] nvarchar(50),
	[electric_vehicle_type] nvarchar(50),
	[vehicle_register_count] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'gold/quantity_of_vehicle_by_type',
	DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_data_src,
	FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM staging.ext_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type
GO


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA dwh
GO

--Crea una tabla interna de SQL Dedicated Pool a partir de la tabla externa
CREATE TABLE dwh.quantity_of_vehicle_by_type
    WITH ( 
      DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	  CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
    )  
    AS 
	SELECT * FROM staging.ext_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type 
GO


SELECT * FROM dwh.quantity_of_vehicle_by_type;
